content:
1. Create an Instagram post featuring the picture of people wandering, with a caption that highlights the importance of traveling and exploring new places. Use hashtags such as #travel #wanderlust #adventure to reach a wider audience.
2. Include a call-to-action in the Instagram post, encouraging followers to message the company for the best budget-friendly travel options.
3. Use Instagram Stories to share tips and tricks for traveling on a budget, such as finding affordable accommodation or cheap flight deals.
4. Leverage Instagram influencers in the travel niche to reach a wider audience and generate leads for the company.
5. Create a Facebook ads campaign targeting people who are interested in traveling and have shown an interest in budget-friendly options. Use the ad to drive traffic to the company's website where they can contact the company for more information.
